wines.description: From the 2020 vintage, expect vanilla and plum. Represents excellent value for this quality level.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with subtle aromas of spice and oak, followed by nuanced notes of earth. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, fruit-forward takes center stage, complemented by complex and balanced. The polished texture and cohesive structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The extended finish is polished and smooth, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: This 2021 selection delivers dark chocolate and oak. Shows the hallmark characteristics of its terroir.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with vibrant aromas of earth and floral, followed by expressive notes of dark fruits. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, structured takes center stage, complemented by fruit-forward and complex. The refined texture and elegant structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The enduring finish is sophisticated and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: This 2018 expression showcases blackcurrant and full-bodied. Perfect for current enjoyment or short-term cellaring.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with delicate aromas of dark fruits and spice, followed by pure notes of oak. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, balanced takes center stage, complemented by structured and fruit-forward. The silky texture and well-balanced structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The persistent finish is graceful and persistent, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.productName: Champagne Bauget-Jouette Cuvee Jouette Extra Brut Milliseme 2016
wines.description: Crafted in 2016, this wine reveals cedar and firm tannins. A wine that balances tradition with modern winemaking.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with pronounced aromas of oak and earth, followed by complex notes of floral. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, complex takes center stage, complemented by balanced and structured. The velvety texture and harmonious structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The lingering finish is elegant and smooth, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: A distinguished contemporary bottling that presents butter and toasted oak. Ideal for both casual sipping and special occasions.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with intense aromas of floral and dark fruits, followed by layered notes of spice. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, fruit-forward takes center stage, complemented by complex and balanced. The smooth texture and integrated structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The long finish is refined and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent aging potential and will continue to evolve with time.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development
